Julian,it is as Jorge mentioned...google translate article:https://g1.globo.com/pe/pernambuco/blog/vive…[embedded video explains that only island residents and certain health etc personnel etc will be allowed in the island]dont know where you are right now, but if possible, best thing is to cancel trip to any part of Brazil.... if already in Brazil, personally, I would try to get to major airport and arrange flights to your home country ASAP, as many flights being canceled, so that you do not get stranded in Brazil.if already in Brazil, check status of your flight reservation home; e,g, American Airlines has already canceled all flights to/from Brazil.[airline websites are not being able to keep up with scores of cancellations etc, so info may not be updated]ever more stringent measures restricting travel etc being adopted thruout Brazil; situation changes by the hour; follow this thread:https://www.tripadvisor.com/ShowTopic-g30350…
